casebody.data:
William KENNY and Vito Cassabalo, Libelants-Appellees, v. BALBACH SMELTING & REFINING COMPANY, Respondent-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 20, 1925.) No. 226. Watson, Harrington & Sheppard and Ralph O. Willguss, all of New York City, for appellant. Macklin, Brown & Van Wyck and Horace L. Cheyney, all of New York City, for appellee.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (6 F.[2d] 671) affirmed, with interest and costs.
